message.body: Can you get to my house by 7:30. Dan is meeting there. You guys can take the van. I need to drive separate.
Tar paper on my porch, ladders, air hose
Do u have a time you can help me sketch up tomorrow ?
Ok thanks. I can wait on getting paid if u need
I can pay you for today. Send me hrs.

I also want to talk schedule and see if I might be able to use the van in June to do install in Tennessee if I get this show. I would have to crate all the mirrors and strap them to the beams on the rack, so I asked Osborne if I could rent his van because uhaul is going to cost a small fortune and I'll have to figure out how to get home
I think he's gonna sell it.
